articles.title: The Language of Dreams
articles.subtitle: How the unconscious mind communicates through emotion and imagery.
articles.main_paragraph_bold: Dreams speak in the emotional language of the soul.
articles.paragraph_1: This article explores how symbols and emotions form the language of dreams. Each image expresses feelings that words cannot capture.
articles.paragraph_2: It shows how understanding this language helps reveal hidden motives, desires and the path to emotional growth.

articles.paragraph_2: Understanding these symbols reveals the emotional structure of the psyche and encourages integration of hidden feelings.

articles.title: The Shadow in Dreams
articles.subtitle: Facing hidden emotions that arise during the night mind.
articles.main_paragraph_bold: Dreams bring to light the emotions we avoid during waking life.
articles.paragraph_1: This article examines how the shadow manifests in dreams through fear or conflict, representing the repressed parts of personality.
articles.paragraph_2: By recognising these emotional symbols, we begin the process of integrating and healing the self through awareness.
